mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT a.FUNC_ID,a.FUNC_CODE,a.FUNC_NAME,a.PARENT_FUNC_ID,a.FUNC_SEQ,a.IS_LEAF,a.FUNC_DESC,a.FUNC_URL,a.STATUS,a.FUNC_TYPE,a.FUNC_AUTH FROM CLT_FUNC a JOIN CLT_FUNC_ROLE b ON a.FUNC_ID=b.FUNC_ID JOIN CLT_ROLE c ON c.ROLE_ID=b.ROLE_ID JOIN CLT_USER_ROLE d ON c.ROLE_ID=d.ROLE_ID WHERE d.USER_ID=#{userId} order by a.FUNC_SEQ

SELECT DISTINCT a.FUNC_ID,a.FUNC_CODE,a.FUNC_NAME,a.PARENT_FUNC_ID,a.FUNC_SEQ,a.IS_LEAF,a.FUNC_DESC,a.FUNC_URL,a.STATUS,a.FUNC_TYPE,a.FUNC_AUTH FROM CLT_FUNC a JOIN CLT_FUNC_ROLE b ON a.FUNC_ID=b.FUNC_ID JOIN CLT_ROLE c ON c.ROLE_ID=b.ROLE_ID JOIN CLT_USER_ROLE d ON c.ROLE_ID=d.ROLE_ID WHERE d.USER_ID=#{userId} and a.PARENT_FUNC_ID=#{parentFuncId} order by a.FUNC_SEQ
select a.* from CLT_FUNC a, CLT_FUNC_ROLE b where a.FUNC_ID=b.FUNC_ID and ROLE_ID = #{roled,jdbcType=CHAR}

SELECT DISTINCT
from CLT_PROJECT_TEAM cpt ,CLT_ROLE cr,CLT_FUNC_ROLE cfr,CLT_FUNC cf where cpt.ROLE_ID = cr.ROLE_ID and cr.ROLE_ID = cfr.ROLE_ID and cfr.FUNC_ID=cf.FUNC_ID and cpt.USER_ID =#{userId}

SELECT b.* FROM CLT_FUNC_ROLE AS a,CLT_FUNC AS b,CLT_ROLE AS c
WHERE a.FUNC_ID = b.FUNC_ID AND a.ROLE_ID = c.ROLE_ID
AND a.ROLE_ID = #{roleId} AND b.FUNC_TYPE = '3'

SELECT d.* FROM CLT_PROJECT_TEAM AS a,CLT_USER_LOGIN AS b ,CLT_FUNC_ROLE AS c,CLT_FUNC AS d
WHERE a.USER_ID = b.USER_ID AND a.ROLE_ID = c.ROLE_ID AND c.FUNC_ID = d.FUNC_ID
AND a.USER_ID = #{userId} AND a.PRO_ID = #{proId} AND d.FUNC_TYPE ='3'
